fields.description:
Description:
Default project appears with an alert "Restart Required" while launching Android Jelly Bean emulator.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new Titanium Mobile Project using V8 
2. In the Project Explorer, right-click on the project 
3. Go to Run As > Android Emulator 

Expected result:
Emulator is launched without any errors and alerts, default project appears as expected

Actual result:
Alert "Restart required" appears
fields.summary: Android: Default project appears with an alert "Restart Required" while launching Android Jelly Bean emulator
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.GA
OS: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
Android 4.1.1 Jelly Bean Emulator

comments.body:
Closing as fixed. Tested and verified on:
OS: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion; Mac OS X Lion 10.7.4
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208201549
Titanium SDK, build: 2.2.0.v20120824100912
Android Emulators: 2.3; 3.2; 4.1

App opens without "Restart required" alert.
